eevol is tailor-made Mobile & Web Applications
Android, iOS & Web development
made in Luxembourg
Let's talk

Services

eevol is focused on custom build mobile and web applications. We develop and lead the projects with the end-user in mind.

iOS & Android Applications

eevol develops iOS & Android applications.

Web Development

eevol develops web-applications that work on the desktop and on the mobile phones. During every step of the development the team aims for stability while maintaining flexibility for the customer.

Agile Methods

eevol develops using agile methods such as SCRUM. These methodologies offer a great liberty to the customers while focusing on the products.

Latest Stories

Read about tech Made in Luxembourg

  • Welcome to Jekyll!

    posted on Feb 19, 2015 by Thierry

    You’ll find this post in your _posts directory. Go ahead and edit it and re-build the site to see your changes. You can rebuild the site in many different ways, but the most common way is to run jekyll serve --watch, which launches a web server and auto-regenerates your site when a file is updated.

    Read the story
